summary: Politics is about making decisions in groups and how power is shared. It's studied in a field called political science. Politics can mean finding peaceful solutions or governing a country. It involves discussing ideas, making laws, and sometimes even using force. People form political parties to represent their beliefs and compete in elections. Politics happens at all levels, from local communities to international relations. It has a long history, with famous thinkers like Plato and Aristotle writing about it.
title: Politics
